meta.title: Bootstrap Icons
meta.description: Bootstrap Icons are designed to work with Bootstrap components, from form controls to navigation. Bootstrap Icons are SVGs, so they scale quickly and easily and can be styled with CSS.

props.description: Name of icon to render. The corresponding icon component must be installed
Contextual color variant. By default the icon inherits the current text color
Contextual color variant. By default the icon inherits the current text color
